item.description:
Join us for a test run of our new Linked In Workshop presentation.

We'll cover the basics as well as dig into some intermediate and expert strategies.

Linked In has just surpassed 135 million users and for certain marketers it's way more than a place to hang your resume.  Linked In is part search engine, part business social media, part powerful marketing tool and it may also help you find your next job or employee.

We'll show you what matters in your profile, how to rank for what you do, why groups are so powerful and what you can do right away to get found on Linked In.

PLUS

In the Spirit of the Boston Internet Marketing Meetup's TRY something NEW theme ~ we'll have the opportunity to test drive new video chat technology.  Anyone who cannot attend in person will be able to attend online!  We are still in the set-up process so stay tuned for details and let us know if you'd like to participate with the online experiment.  And you know how we like our Marketing Experiments now.....so

We have been offered a special beta test BIMM Event (pre-launch) of a new website called Shindig. This site takes Video Chat to a new level and will blow Facebook away! Imagine if you were a part of testing Facebook...now's your chance to be a part of testing a terrific site for Functionality, User Experience, Technology and Games!

Why Not? It's fun, It's FREE and only we will be on there (the site is not live yet, so the experience will be PRIVATE)

They are creating a video conference room just for us. We can all be in there and if you want, you can go 1-1 with up to 5 people privately at the same time...

Details to follow as we get closer to the workshop.

ABOUT Shindig:

Shindig is a NYC start-up committed to unleashing the unrealized potential of video chat. Shindig's proprietary technology allows for the free flowing engagement of participants in large-scale group chats. In Shindig, you see the natural ebb and flow of conversations and move seamlessly between them. Current video chat locks you in a conversation and creates a feeling of imprisonment. Shindig acknowledges that freedom as to how you engage and with whom you engage is an indispensable ingredient in a natural and comfortable video chat experience.

************************************************

It should be the usual - a casual, fun, learning event; with a large dose of conversation + Q&A + a wide range of members happy to share experiences. 

We look forward to seeing you there! - Lew, Bruce & Keith
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the conference room at the end of the building - look for the signs.
item.name: Linked In Workshop (with a high tech video chat test)
